languages.text: "Думаешь, я бы позволил тебе {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Quetza_WinterscaleCalm}вновь загасить мой охотничий пыл{/d}?" {n}Каллигос едко ухмыляется.{/n} "К тому же ты был{mf||а} слишком занят{mf||а} своими ксенодрузьями, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. Даже нам, вершителям судеб миров, невозможно получить в этой жизни все и сразу".

traits.locale_text: "Думаешь, я бы позволил тебе вновь загасить мой охотничий пыл?" {n}Каллигос едко ухмыляется.{/n} "К тому же ты был{mf||а} слишком занят{mf||а} своими ксено-друзьями, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. Даже нам, вершителям судеб миров, невозможно получить в этой жизни все и сразу".

languages.text: "You think that I would let you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Quetza_WinterscaleCalm}dampen my hunting spirit again{/d}?" {n}Calligos smirks.{/n} "Besides, you were too preoccupied with your xenos friends! Even those such as we who write the fates of worlds cannot have everything all at once in this life."
languages.original_text: "Думаешь, я бы позволил тебе {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Quetza_WinterscaleCalm}вновь загасить мой охотничий пыл{/d}?" {n}Каллигос едко ухмыляется.{/n} "К тому же ты был{mf||а} слишком занят{mf||а} своими ксенодрузьями, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. Даже нам, вершителям судеб миров, невозможно получить в этой жизни все и сразу".

traits.locale_text: "You think I would have let you curb my hunting heat again?" {n}Calligos gives a biting smile.{/n} "Besides, you were too preoccupied with your new xenos friends! Even we, the arbiters of worlds' destinies, cannot have everything all at once in this life."

"You think I would have let you curb my hunting heat again?" {n}Calligos gives a biting smile.{/n} "Besides, you were too preoccupied with your new xenos friends! Even we, the arbiters of worlds' destinies, cannot have everything all at once in this life."

"You think I would have let you curb my hunting heat again?" {n}Calligos gives a biting smile.{/n} "Besides, you were too preoccupied with your new xenos friends! Even we, the arbiters of worlds' destinies, cannot have everything all at once in this life."

"You think I would have let you curb my hunting heat again?" {n}Calligos gives a biting smile.{/n} "Besides, you were too preoccupied with your new xenos friends! Even we, the arbiters of worlds' destinies, cannot have everything all at once in this life."

"You think that I would let you dampen my hunting spirit again?" {n}Calligos smirks.{/n} "Besides, you were too preoccupied with your xenos friends! Even those such as we who write the fates of worlds cannot have everything all at once in this life."

"You think that I would let you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Quetza_WinterscaleCalm}dampen my hunting spirit again{/d}?" {n}Calligos smirks.{/n} "Besides, you were too preoccupied with your xenos friends! Even those such as we who write the fates of worlds cannot have everything all at once in this life."

"You think that I would let you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Quetza_WinterscaleCalm}dampen my hunting spirit again{/d}?" {n}Calligos smirks.{/n} "Besides, you were too preoccupied with your xenos friends! Even those such as we who write the fates of worlds cannot have everything all at once in this life."

languages.text: «¿Creía que iba a dejarle {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Quetza_WinterscaleCalm}refrenar mi pasión por la caza otra vez{/d}?». {n}Calligos sonríe con arrogancia.{/n} «¡Además, estaba usted muy {mf|ocupado|ocupada} con sus nuevos amigos xenos! Ni siquiera quienes decidimos el destino de mundos enteros, como usted y yo, podemos tenerlo todo en esta vida».
languages.original_text: "You think that I would let you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Quetza_WinterscaleCalm}dampen my hunting spirit again{/d}?" {n}Calligos smirks.{/n} "Besides, you were too preoccupied with your xenos friends! Even those such as we who write the fates of worlds cannot have everything all at once in this life."

traits.locale_text: «¿Se cree que iba a dejarle refrenar mi pasión por la caza otra vez?». {n}Calligos te dedica una sonrisa mordaz.{/n} «¡Además, estaba usted muy {mf|ocupado|ocupada} con sus nuevos amigos xenos! Ni siquiera nosotros, que decidimos el destino de mundos enteros, podemos tenerlo todo en esta vida».

languages.text: “你以为我会{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Quetza_WinterscaleCalm}再让你干扰我的狩猎{/d}吗？”{n}卡里戈斯得意洋洋地笑了起来。{/n}“而且，你和你那些异形新朋友走得太近了！即便是我们，无数世界命运的主宰，也不可能得到这世上的一切。”
languages.original_text: "You think that I would let you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Quetza_WinterscaleCalm}dampen my hunting spirit again{/d}?" {n}Calligos smirks.{/n} "Besides, you were too preoccupied with your xenos friends! Even those such as we who write the fates of worlds cannot have everything all at once in this life."

traits.locale_text: “你以为我会再让你打断我的狩猎吗？”{n}卡里戈斯刻薄地微笑着。{/n}“而且，你和你那些异形新朋友太要好了！即便是我们，无数世界命运的主宰，也不可能得到这世上的一切。”

languages.text: « Parce que vous croyez que je vais vous laisser {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Quetza_WinterscaleCalm}gâcher mon plaisir de chasser encore une fois{/d} ?{n}demande Calligos en ricanant.{/n} Du reste, vous étiez trop {mf|préoccupé|préoccupée} par vos amis xénos ! Même nous, qui décidons du destin des mondes, nous ne pouvons pas tout avoir, dans cette vie. »
languages.original_text: "You think that I would let you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Quetza_WinterscaleCalm}dampen my hunting spirit again{/d}?" {n}Calligos smirks.{/n} "Besides, you were too preoccupied with your xenos friends! Even those such as we who write the fates of worlds cannot have everything all at once in this life."

traits.locale_text: « Parce que vous croyez que je vais vous laisser {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Quetza_WinterscaleCalm}gâcher mon plaisir de chasser encore une fois{/d} ?{n}demande Calligos en ricanant.{/n} Du reste, vous étiez trop {mf|préoccupé|préoccupée} par vos amis xénos ! Même nous, qui décidons du destin des mondes, nous ne pouvons pas tout avoir, dans cette vie. »

languages.text: 「また俺の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Quetza_WinterscaleCalm}狩猟熱を抑えさせる{/d}と思ったか？」{n}カリゴスはニヤリと笑う。{/n}「それに、お前は新しい異種族のご友人のことで頭がいっぱいだった！世界の運命を左右する俺たちでさえ、この人生ですべてを一度に手に入れることはできないようだな」
languages.original_text: "You think that I would let you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Quetza_WinterscaleCalm}dampen my hunting spirit again{/d}?" {n}Calligos smirks.{/n} "Besides, you were too preoccupied with your xenos friends! Even those such as we who write the fates of worlds cannot have everything all at once in this life."

traits.locale_text: 「また俺の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Quetza_WinterscaleCalm}狩猟熱を抑えさせる{/d}と思ったか？」{n}カリゴスはニヤリと笑う。{/n}「それに、お前は新しい異種族のご友人のことで頭がいっぱいだった！世界の運命を左右する俺たちでさえ、この人生ですべてを一度に手に入れることはできないようだな」

languages.text: "Glaubt Ihr, ich würde {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Quetza_WinterscaleCalm}mir von Euch wieder die Lust an der Jagd nehmen lassen{/d}?" {n}Calligos grinst.{/n} "Zudem wart Ihr zu sehr mit Euren Xenos-Freunden beschäftigt! Selbst wir, die wir über das Schicksal von Welten entscheiden, können nicht alles im Leben gleichzeitig haben."
languages.original_text: "You think that I would let you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Quetza_WinterscaleCalm}dampen my hunting spirit again{/d}?" {n}Calligos smirks.{/n} "Besides, you were too preoccupied with your xenos friends! Even those such as we who write the fates of worlds cannot have everything all at once in this life."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr glaubt, ich würde Euch erneut meinen Jagdrausch bremsen lassen?" {n}Calligos grinst bissig.{/n} "Zudem wart Ihr zu sehr mit Euren neuen Xenos-Freunden beschäftigt! Selbst wir, die Richter über das Schicksal von Welten, können nicht alles im Leben gleichzeitig haben."

"Glaubt Ihr, ich würde mir von Euch wieder die Lust an der Jagd nehmen lassen?" {n}Calligos grinst.{/n} "Zudem wart Ihr zu sehr mit Euren Xenos-Freunden beschäftigt! Selbst wir, die wir über das Schicksal von Welten entscheiden, können nicht alles im Leben gleichzeitig haben."

languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Quetza_WinterscaleCalm}Av neşemi bir kez daha kaçırmana{/d} izin vereceğimi mi sanıyorsun?" {n}Calligos sırıtıyor.{/n} "Ayrıca zeno arkadaşlarınla çok meşguldün! Bizim gibi dünyaların kaderlerini belirleyenler bile bu hayatta aynı anda her şeye sahip olamazlar."
languages.original_text: "You think that I would let you {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Quetza_WinterscaleCalm}dampen my hunting spirit again{/d}?" {n}Calligos smirks.{/n} "Besides, you were too preoccupied with your xenos friends! Even those such as we who write the fates of worlds cannot have everything all at once in this life."
